docs.lead_paragraph: As is prepares to reopen in a new downtown space, the center is trying to define what image-making means today.
docs.abstract: International Center of Photography is set to reopen in Lower East Side space with new focus on navigating rapidly evolving, largely digital, contemporary visual culture; plans for displaying permanent collection of traditional photographic works are unclear.
